articles.description: He and Bumrah started off as tennis-ball bowlers in matches of six to eight overs in Gujarat. Friday night was not too different for them
articles.content: From outsider to contender, Axar Patel is on the move

articles.title: Rohit showed why he is superior to others, good to see him back: Ajay Jadeja - Cricbuzz
articles.description: Rohit Sharma led India's chase from the front with a 20-ball 46* in the 2nd T20I. Ajay Jadeja & Joy Bhattacharjya praise Rohit's match-winning knock, on Cric...
